      • classNameOf

        public java.lang.String classNameOf(java.lang.String checkID)
        Gives a String of class of Registerable object an ID refers to in this library.
        Parameters:
        checkID - The unique ID String of a Registerable object.
        Returns:
        A String representing the class of the object ID given if it is in the Library. "Question", "Test", "Course" or "Unregistered"
